query: ALTER TABLE deployment_volume ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_volume_pk PRIMARY KEY(id), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_volume_fk_deployment_id FOREIGN KEY(deployment_id) REFERENCES deployment(id), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_volume_chk_size_unsigned CHECK(volume_size > 0), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_volume_name_unique_deployment_id UNIQUE(deployment_id, name), ADD CONSTRAINT deployment_volume_path_unique_deployment_id UNIQUE(deployment_id, volume_mount_path);
